title: Opening Procedures
description: Daily tasks to complete when opening the studio
step1_description: Arrive 15 minutes before first class. Unlock all entry doors and check that security system is disarmed.
step2_description: Turn on all interior lights including lobby, studios, and hallways.
step3_description: Verify HVAC is set to appropriate temperature. Adjust as needed for comfort.
step4_description: Power on computers, open scheduling software, and review day's schedule.
step5_description: Check all studios for cleanliness and ensure equipment is ready.
step6_description: Check voicemail, email, and parent communications for urgent matters.

title: Closing Procedures
description: Daily tasks to complete when closing the studio
step1_description: Count and secure all cash. Complete daily cash reconciliation report.
step2_description: Sweep floors, wipe mirrors, and ensure all equipment is stored properly.
step3_description: Verify restrooms are clean and stocked with supplies.
step4_description: Shut down all computers, sound systems, and non-essential equipment.
step5_description: Adjust HVAC to energy-saving mode for overnight.
step6_description: Check all doors and windows are locked. Arm security system.

title: Emergency Evacuation
description: Procedures for safely evacuating the building in case of emergency
step1_description: Activate fire alarm or make verbal announcement of evacuation.
step2_description: Direct all students and visitors to nearest exit. Do not use elevators.
step3_description: Help anyone requiring assistance to evacuate safely.
step4_description: Use class roster to verify all students are present at assembly point.
step5_description: Call 911 if not already done. Report emergency and building location.
step6_description: Remain at assembly point until fire department gives all clear.

title: New Student Orientation
description: Process for welcoming and orienting new students
step1_description: Greet family warmly. Introduce yourself and your role.
step2_description: Show student and family around the studio including restrooms and waiting areas.
step3_description: Review class rules, dress code, and attendance policies.
step4_description: Introduce new student to classmates and make them feel welcome.
step5_description: After class, check in with new student about their experience.
